00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00034 
00035 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS "../data/test.file.data_dat_with_grid"
00036 
00037 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_MultipleSets );
00038 
00039 DataSetTest_MultipleSets::DataSetTest_MultipleSets()
00040 {
00041         data = 0;
00042         dataPlane = 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 DataSetTest_MultipleSets::~DataSetTest_MultipleSets()
00046 {
00047 
00048 }
00049 
00050 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::setUp()
00051 {
00052         // Open one DataSet.
00053         data = new GenericData;
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS;
00056         reader.SetFilename(name);
00057         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00058         try
00059         {
00060                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0); // acquired data is the first DataSet of the first DataGroup.
00061         }
00062         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00063         {
00064                 dataPlane = 0;
00065         }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::tearDown()
00069 {
00070         if (dataPlane)
00071                 dataPlane->Delete();
00072         delete data;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testCreation()
00076 {
00077         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testCreateSecondDataSet()
00082 {
00083         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testOpenTwoDataSets()
00090 {
00091         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00093 
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00098 }
00099 
00100 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testAccessDataFromTwoDifferentDataSets()
00101 {
00102         // Create second DataSet
00103         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"grid position"));
00105 
00106         // Open both DataSets
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00109 
00110         // Access the data from both DataSets
00111 
00112         // Access from the grid DataSet
00113         int32_t rows = gridDP->Rows();
00114         int32_t cols = gridDP->Cols();
00115         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00116         {
00117                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00118                 {
00119                         // Compute the expected value
00120                         float expected = (float)(row*100 + col/2); // corner = col/2
00121 
00122                         float value;
00123                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, col, value));
00124                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         // Access the acquired data DataSet
00129         rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00130         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00131         {
00132                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00133                 u_int16_t value;
00134                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00135                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00136         }
00137 
00138         // Access the grid DataSet again.
00139         rows = gridDP->Rows();
00140         cols = gridDP->Cols();
00141         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00142         {
00143                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00144                 {
00145                         // Compute the expected value
00146                         float expected = (float)(row*100 + col/2); // corner = col/2
00147 
00148                         float value;
00149                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, col, value));
00150                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00151                 }
00152         }
00153 
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00156 }
00157 
00158 void DataSetTest_MultipleSets::testAccessDataFromTwoInstancesOfSamePlane()
00159 {
00160         // Create second instance of the acquired data DataSet
00161         DataSet* gridDP=NULL;
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP = data->DataSet(L"",L"acquired data"));
00163 
00164         // Open both DataSets
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gridDP->Open() == true);
00167 
00168         // Access the first instance DataSet
00169         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00170         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00171         {
00172                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00173                 u_int16_t value;
00174                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00175                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00176         }
00177 
00178         // Access the second instance of the acquired data DataSet
00179         rows = gridDP->Rows();
00180         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00181         {
00182                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00183                 u_int16_t value;
00184                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->GetData(row, 0, value));
00185                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00186         }
00187 
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(gridDP->Delete());      // also calls Close
00190 }
